lines.text:
[on why she wants to go to america]
I love Elvis Presley, I dig the rock and roll, I want to FUCK... John Wayne
Dori, you're beautiful. You always know where you are on this earth
I've forgotten all about beds, I wonder which side Carmella sleeps on.
Don't you dare walk like that for another man, I will buy all your flowers myself.

When I dreamed about coming here. I never dreamed about juan, and when I met him I was free the way I thought the United States was free... inside of him free. After so many years... how could the gods have planned it this way.
She's a good girl but she is an American. Who could have imagined me having an American for a daughter?
